sentences.en: A fish's scales overlap each other.
From increasing experience with these conditions, there is also much overlap.
sentences.cn: 对上述情况不断积累的经验来看, 其相互间仍有许多共同之处.

sentences.en: Generally they must all fit together without gap or overlap.
sentences.cn: 总的来说,图幅按边必须无误,不得有裂隙或重叠.

sentences.en: History and politics overlap and should be studied togother.
sentences.cn: 历史与政治有相同之处,应该一起来研究.

sentences.en: Our concern and theirs substantially overlap.
sentences.cn: 我们的利害关系和他们的大致相合.

sentences.en: Overlap the slices carefully so there are no gaps.
sentences.cn: 将切片小心翼翼地搭好，中间不留任何空隙。

sentences.en: The edges must overlap each other or weeds will push through the gaps.
sentences.cn: 边缘必须互搭在一起，否则杂草会从缝隙中钻出来。

sentences.en: The needs of patients invariably overlap.
sentences.cn: 病人的需求总有一些是一致的。

sentences.en: The overlap between the jacket and the trousers is not good.
sentences.cn: 夹克和裤子重叠的部分不好看.

sentences.en: The roofing slates were laid to overlap each other.
sentences.cn: 石板屋瓦是相叠着放置的.

sentences.en: The two storage rings overlap closely.
sentences.cn: 两个储存环节紧密重合.

sentences.en: The upper layer of felt should overlap the lower.
sentences.cn: 毛毡的上层应与下层重叠。

sentences.en: There is no question of overlap between the two courses.
sentences.cn: 这两门课程之间不存在重叠的问题.

sentences.en: Use vinyl seam adhesive where vinyls overlap.
sentences.cn: 塑料布相叠处用塑料封口胶粘起来。

sentences.en: When the bag is folded, the bottom overlaps one side.
sentences.cn: 把包折叠起来时，其底部与一边就重合了。

trans.tran_cn: 重叠部分，覆盖物，涂盖层，[数]交叠，相交
trans.tran_en: the amount by which two activities, ideas, things etc overlap
If one thing overlaps another, or if you overlap them, a part of the first thing occupies the same area as a part of the other thing. You can also say that two things overlap.

trans.tran_cn: 互搭，重叠，部分相同，[数]有与…共同的某物
